text: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
author: Austin Freeman

text: Programs must be written for people to read.
author: Harold Abelson

text: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.
author: Linus Torvalds

text: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

text: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
author: Alan Kay

text: Stay hungry, stay foolish.
author: Steve Jobs

text: Growth and comfort do not coexist.
author: Ginni Rommetty

text: Technology is best when it brings people together.
author: Matt Mullenweg

text: The technology you use impresses no one. The experience you create with it is everything.
author: Sean Gerety

text: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don’t really even notice it, so it’s part of everyday life.
author: Bill Gates

text: If you’re offered a seat on a rocket ship, don’t ask what seat.
author: Sheryl Sandberg

text: You can focus on things that are barriers or you can focus on scaling the wall or redefining the problem.
author: Tim Cook

text: Don’t be afraid to change the model.
author: Reed Hastings

text: Never trust a computer you can’t throw out a window.
author: Steven Wozniak

text: Never let a computer know you’re in a hurry.
author: author unknown

text: Hardware: The parts of a computer system that can be kicked.
author: Jeff Pesis

text: Once a new technology rolls over you, if you’re not part of the steamroller, you’re part of the road.
author: Stewart Brand

text: If it keeps up, man will atrophy all his limbs but the push-button finger.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

text: Technology is ruled by two types of people: those who manage what they do not understand, and those who understand what they do not manage.
author: Make Trout

text: Technology is like a fish. The longer it stays on the shelf, the less desirable it becomes.
author: Andrew Heller

text: I just invent. Then I wait until man comes around to needing what I’ve invented.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

text: Computers have lots of memory but no imagination.
author: author unknown

text: People who smile while they are alone used to be called insane until we invented smartphones and social media.
author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

text: I won’t be impressed with technology until I can download food.
author: author unknown

text: Life was much easier when Apple and Blackberry were just fruits.
author: author unknown
